metadata.dc:author: Bañares, F
Pérez-González, J
Bullón, A
Bueno, M
González-Díaz, J P
Cortabarría, C
metadata.dc:description: A female child, 5 years 10/12 old, is presented with a nephroblastoma inserted on a horse-shoe kidney. She is in a satisfactory state 14 months after surgery. The authors emphasize the favorable outcome with a treatment of combined surgery, radiotherapy and vincristine.
metadata.dc:title: Nefroblastoma en el riñón en herradura. Revisión a propósito de una nueva observación
[Nephroblastoma on a horse-shoe kidney].
